languages.text: "Его останки, подвергнутые поруганию, были обнаружены в камерах, где прежде морили заключенных в ходе дознания "странных" каторжан".
"His defiled remains were found inside one of the cells where prisoners were being tortured during the investigation of the 'strange' convicts."
languages.original_text: "Его останки, подвергнутые поруганию, были обнаружены в камерах, где прежде морили заключенных в ходе дознания "странных" каторжан".

traits.locale_text: "His desecrated remains were found inside the cells where the prisoners have been tortured during the interrogation of the 'strange' convicts."
"His desecrated remains were found inside the cells where the prisoners have been tortured during the interrogation of the 'strange' convicts."
"His defiled remains were found inside one of the cells where prisoners were being tortured during the investigation of the 'strange' convicts."
"His desecrated remains were found inside the cells where the prisoners were being tortured during the interrogation of the 'strange' convicts."
"His desecrated remains were found inside the cells where the prisoners were being tortured during the interrogation of the 'strange' convicts."
"His defiled remains were found inside one of the cells where prisoners were being tortured during the investigation of the 'strange' convicts."
"His defiled remains were found inside one of the cells where prisoners were being tortured during the investigation of the 'strange' convicts."
"His defiled remains were found inside one of the cells where prisoners were being tortured during the investigation of the 'strange' convicts."

languages.text: “在那之后，人们在牢房里发现了他遭到亵渎的遗体。在之前那场针对‘古怪囚犯’的调查期间，所有囚犯都是在那间牢房里遭到折磨的。”
languages.original_text: "His defiled remains were found inside one of the cells where prisoners were being tortured during the investigation of the 'strange' convicts."

traits.locale_text: “在那之后，人们在牢房里发现了他遭到亵渎的遗体。在之前那场针对‘古怪囚犯’的调查期间，所有囚犯都是在那间牢房里遭到折磨的。”
“在那之后，人们在牢房里发现了他遭到亵渎的遗体。在之前那场针对‘古怪囚犯’的审讯期间，所有囚犯都是在那间牢房里遭到折磨的。”

languages.text: «Sus restos profanados se encontraron en una de las celdas donde torturaban a los presos durante la investigación de los convictos extraños».
languages.original_text: "His defiled remains were found inside one of the cells where prisoners were being tortured during the investigation of the 'strange' convicts."

traits.locale_text: «Sus restos profanados se encontraron en una de las celdas donde torturaban a los presos durante la investigación de los convictos extraños».

languages.text: 「彼の汚された遺体は、 '奇妙な '受刑者の尋問中、囚人たちが拷問を受けていたセル内で発見されました」
languages.original_text: "His defiled remains were found inside one of the cells where prisoners were being tortured during the investigation of the 'strange' convicts."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の冒涜された遺体は、 '奇妙な '受刑者の尋問中、囚人たちが拷問を受けていたセル内で発見されました」
「彼の冒涜された遺体は、 '奇妙な '受刑者の尋問中、囚人たちが拷問を受けていたセル内で発見されました」

languages.text: « Son cadavre a été retrouvé dans une cellule où l'on interrogeait les détenus "étranges". »
languages.original_text: "His defiled remains were found inside one of the cells where prisoners were being tortured during the investigation of the 'strange' convicts."

traits.locale_text: « Son cadavre a été retrouvé dans une cellule où l'on interrogeait les détenus "étranges". »

languages.text: "Seine sterblichen Überreste wurden in einer der Zellen gefunden, in denen die Gefangenen während der Untersuchung der 'merkwürdigen' Sträflinge gefoltert wurden."
languages.original_text: "His defiled remains were found inside one of the cells where prisoners were being tortured during the investigation of the 'strange' convicts."

traits.locale_text: "Seine sterblichen Überreste wurden in einer der Zellen gefunden, in denen die Gefangenen während der Untersuchung der 'merkwürdigen' Sträflinge gefoltert wurden."
"Seine entweihten Überreste wurden in den Zellen gefunden, in denen die Gefangenen während des Verhörs der 'merkwürdigen' Sträflinge gefoltert wurden."

languages.text: "Kirlettikleri naaşı, 'tuhaf' hükümlülerin soruşturma esnasında işkence gördüğü hücrelerden birinde bulunmuş."
languages.original_text: "His defiled remains were found inside one of the cells where prisoners were being tortured during the investigation of the 'strange' convicts."

traits.locale_text: "Kirlettikleri naaşı, 'tuhaf' hükümlülerin soruşturma esnasında işkence gördüğü hücrelerden birinde bulunmuş."
